name: Abdullah Al Redwan Newaz
content: Redwan Newaz, Abdullah Al | The University of New Orleans Skip to main content Computer Science Undergraduate Program Graduate Program Certificate Programs Facilities Student Resources Faculty and Staff Contact Us External Advisory Board Abdullah Al Redwan Newaz, Ph.D. Assistant Professor Director of aiR Lab Contact aredwann@uno.edu Personal Website Education Ph.D. in Information Science, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, Ishikawa, JapanM.S. in Information Science, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, Ishikawa, Japan About Dr. Abdullah Al Redwan Newaz is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of New Orleans.Earlier, he was a Postdoctoral Research Associate at North Carolina A&T State, Greensboro, NC in 2022-2020, Rice University, Houston, TX 2018-2020, and Nagoya University, Nagoya, Japan in 2017-2018. Research Interests My research interests lie in the areas of Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Cyber-Physical Systems.Particularly, my research interests include autonomous systems, applied machine learning, motion planning under uncertainty, optimal control, deep learning-based perception methods, model checking, and related domains.My research goal is to balance both theory and practical implementations, with an emphasis on developing elegant, scalable, theoretically sound algorithms for solving real-world robotics applications.
